text: The basic method of construction is both simple and extremely flexible. Figure 3 illustrates the arrangement of a single passage. This can be extended in length and width up to the limit of manufacturing equipment available. The corrugation is machine-formed, thus ensuring a high standard of uniformity in height and fin pitch.
